titles.title: Lobbying Disclosure Improvement Act
Lobbying Disclosure Improvement Act
To amend the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 to require certain disclosures by registrants regarding exemptions under the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938, as amended.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Lobbying Disclosure Improvement Act
This bill requires registered lobbyists to disclose whether they are exempt from having to register as foreign agents due to their lobbying activities and status as registered lobbyists.
